resources.string: Weak passwords are extremely dangerous and pose a great risk to your private data! The password you just entered does NOT meet the minimum recommended standards.
Allow google to save your password so that you won\'t need to remember it

seems like you didn\'t verify your Email when you created your account. Click the button below to receive an Email containing a verification link. \n\n NB: Link will be sent to the email you used when creating account.
